page.title: 14LITTLE THEATRE,DONNINGTON
page.content: The Little Theatre is one of only two purpose-built theatres in Telford. Amateur theatrical productions also take place in multi-purpose buildings throughput the town.The nearest professional theatre is "The Grand" in Wolverhampton. Little Theatre occupies a site on Donnington Garrison and is owned by the army.It opened as a theatre in 1953 and is run by Donnington Garrison Amateur Dramatic and Operatic Society which has more than 70 members living in the Telford area.They usually put on 6 varied productions a year including plays, pantomime, and musical shows.There is seating for 240 and prices range from Â£1.25 to Â£2.00 The current production is a mystery thriller "An Inspector Calls" by J.B. Priestley.The Christmas pantomime will be "Aladdin"
